header.name: Ramkumar
header.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer / Cloud Engineer

summary: 14+ years in Site Reliability Engineering and Cloud Operations across banking and fintech.
Expert in Python automation, observability, Kubernetes, and system design.
Proven leadership in managing global SRE teams and delivering zero-downtime migrations.

bullets.text: Led a global SRE team ensuring 99.99% availability for mission-critical apps.
Built Python self-service portal for logging NFR fields, improving logging quality by 60%.
Designed HA/DR architecture across AWS regions.
Automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins & Terraform reducing release time by 40%.
Drove observability stack modernization (Splunk → Prometheus + Grafana).
Migrated 50+ apps from on-prem to AWS Kubernetes (EKS).
Developed Python scripts for incident triage reducing MTTR by 30%.
Implemented SLO/SLI framework and automated dashboards.

projects.text: Self-service portal for NFR logging fields streamlining compliance.
